price: 18. Misna, maxaa ku ogeysiiyey waxay Maalinta is abaal marintu tahay?
arabic: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا يَوۡمُ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: thumma mā adrāka mā yawmu al-dīni
